Yes, as twins, Zeph and Kira share a unique bond between their resonant souls, which can have different implications on their magic abilities. When Zeph dies, the resonance potential of his resonant soul is redistributed to Kira, this could be seen as a way that the universe balances the power distribution.

When this happens, Kira's magic abilities would increase significantly, allowing her to gain access to more powerful spells and incantations. She would also be able to cast spells with less cost to her life force, as the distribution of resonance means that her body is more able to handle the strain of spellcasting.

However, it's also important to note that this sudden increase in power could also be dangerous for Kira, as she may not be fully trained to handle this level of magic yet. It could also be a difficult psychological adjustment for her, as she may feel guilty for her brother's death, and also because this sudden increase in power could also cause some tensions and conflicts with other characters, especially Eris as she may feel resentful towards Kira for receiving such a powerful gift.

Overall, while this sudden increase in power could be seen as a blessing, it could also be a curse, and it would be important for the story to explore the consequences of this event and how it affects Kira's relationships and her journey.
